data.name: Picture Perfect - The Walkthrough
data.detailed_description:
Official walkthrough document for the visual novel Picture Perfect.

HOW TO USE: To access the PDF walkthrough, please go to where you installed the game and you will see "Official Picture Perfect Walkthrough" alongside the other game files. If you don't know how to do that, you can look at the directions below.

1) Right click the Picture Perfect game on Steam client.

2) On the window that pops up click "local game files."

3) Click "browse" and you should be looking at the installed game files where the walkthrough is located.

***The Miracle ending has no hidden points, so it isn't included in the walkthrough and you can choose whatever you want!***

data.short_description: Guidance for Points, Checks and Choices you will have to make in game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7
  • Additional Notes: A PDF reading software is needed

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina
  • Additional Notes: A PDF reading software is needed

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any modern distro

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains age-restricted content solely intended for legal adults 18 years and older. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.

Contains nudity, graphic depictions of oral, vaginal and other sexual acts.
